summary: A gangster tries to find redemption with the inadvertent help of an innocent shop girl and his jealous girlfriend will do anything to keep him.
cast: Kinuyo Tanaka|Jôji Oka|Sumiko Mizukubo|Kôji Mitsui|Yumeko Aizome|Yoshio Takayama|Koji Kaga|Yasuo Nanjo|Shunsaku Kashima|Seiji Nishimura|Chishû Ryû|Nobuo Takemura|Reikô Tani
title: La mujer proscrita
